product.title: Magnum Antique - Day Night Blind
product.description: The magnum in antique features a double-layered, creamy white fabric, gently interwoven with faint hints of coffee brown. The result is, true to its name, a faintly antiqued effect that adds character and depth to an otherwise simple blind. The antique would look stunningly pretty against a vintage pink wall in the master or guest bedroom. Furnish the room with vintage woods to complement the brown in the blind and with sweet florals and antiqued linens for a gorgeously chic effect.

relproducts.title: Premium Antique Gold Venetian Blind - 25mm Slat

Bringing a whole lot of elegance to your dcor, its versatile, modern and would look stunning paired with deep blues and metallic highlights to really a beautiful neutral with a shimmering golden finish, we love the dazzling design of the premium antique gold venetian blind.

relproducts.title: Sevilla Antique Cream Vertical Blind
relproducts.description: Light and creamy, this sevilla antique cream vertical blind is ideal for keeping your home looking light and spacious with a drop of warmth to boot. The beige colouring will sit beautifully amongst a whole host of palettes while the blackout backing will give your home that ex light and creamy, this sevilla antique cream vertical blind is ideal for keeping your home looking light and spacious with a drop of warmth to boot.

relproducts.title: Antique Cream Faux Wood Blind - 50mm Slat
relproducts.description: When whites a little bright, this antique cream blind is the perfect antidote. Its got a gentle touch that will caress your windows and create a lovely air of comfort. Appearances can be deceptive though because this blind is also tough as old boots. The faux wood slats are when whites a little bright, this antique cream blind is the perfect antidote.

relproducts.title: Amor Antique Steel Vertical Blind
relproducts.description: A soft, light grey that doesn't try too hard to stand out, the antique steel colour is a beautifully understated blind that just quietly gets on with the job of blocking out direct sunlight without too much fanfare. Used to mellow the palettes of brightly coloured rooms, the antique steel is suitable for literally any room of the house. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.

relproducts.title: Palace Antique Roller Blind
relproducts.description: With a metallic backdrop featuring a floral design provides a feeling of elegance in a room. Available in other soft tones. Palace antique roller blind available from leading blinds supplier kingston blinds direct. Order a free sample and get an instant price online.

relproducts.title: Woodgrain Antique Oak Venetian Blind - 25mm Slat
relproducts.description: Aluminium venetian blinds are a contemporary classic, offering endless practicality and effortless control of the light. With this stunning example though, some stylish touches add a layer of chic that really elevates the appeal. With its warm, organic woodgrain shade and texture aluminium venetian blinds are a contemporary classic, offering endless practicality and effortless control of the light.

relproducts.title: Amor Antique Steel With Haze Pure Double Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Their double roller blinds give you total control and practicality, with both blinds installed on the same bracket you won't need to worry about installing twice. Lower the voile fabric to give your home the daytime privacy you require. Gently filtering the light and preventing people from seeing in, this blind is ideal for those who don't want to be overlooked. Amor antique steel with haze pure double roller blind combining two of their most popular roller blinds in one, this amor antique steel and haze pure double roller blind gives you the best of both worlds.

relproducts.title: Day & Night Flecked Grey
relproducts.description: Looking for something a little different? The alternating fabric strips give these blinds the privacy of a dimout blind, but also the transparency of a voile blind. Simply close or open the blind to move the strips to see out, or block yourself in. With their destinctive look, their day & night blinds don't just look amazing, but will also give you control over the light entering your room. The unique 2 layered fabric gives this blind a look like no other.
